content: this slouchy adult size hat features a textured stitch on the brim that is ideal for showcasing variegated yarns as well as solids you will find the pattern easy enough to work while chatting with friends at knit night or anywhere else this hat matches **the knit night gloves** found here 1 **to alter the size of knit night hat** cast on a multiple of 10 sts so instead of casting on 110 stitches you may cast on 100 sts or 90 80 70 and so on depending on the size you would like then just follow the pattern as written the length of the hat may be adjusted to any length work to your desired length **before** beginning the decrease rounds at the top of the hat kata has translated this pattern into hungarian it can be found here 2 thank you kata claudia flinkhand 3 has very kindly translated this pattern into german the german version is available by clicking on the free ravelry download button above and choosing the german pdf option thank you claudia 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/knit-night-gloves 2 http //egyuttkotunk blogspot hu/2012/11/kontyos-sapka html 3 http //www ravelry com/people/flinkhand
